snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk practiced with the Devils for the first time since he injured his right shoulder on March 23, offering a ray of hope for a team that has dropped seven games in a row.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils winger Ilya Kovalchuk practices with team for first time since injuring his right shoulder.
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk practiced with the Devils for the first time since he injured his right shoulder on March 23, offering a ray of hope for a team that has dropped seven games in a row.

headline.seo: Devils’ Ilya Kovalchuk Practices, but Still Unclear on Return
headline.main: Kovalchuk, Return Still Unclear, Practices With the Reeling Devils
